meanings.definition: In a brave and fearless manner.
meanings.sent1: She walked courageously into the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter courageously rescued the kitten from the burning building.
meanings.sent3: The little mouse courageously faced the big cat, trying to scare it away.
meanings.sent4: The student courageously tackled the difficult math problem, determined to solve it.
meanings.sent5: The knight rode courageously into battle, ready to defend his kingdom.

meanings.sent1: The courageous firefighter saved the family from the burning house.
meanings.sent2: She received a medal for her courageous act of saving the drowning child.
meanings.sent3: The courageous little squirrel tried to stand up to the big dog in the park.
meanings.sent4: The courageous decision to speak up against injustice inspired others to do the same.
meanings.sent5: The courageous explorer ventured into the unknown jungle, eager to discover new species.
